Dec 16 (Reuters) - Airtel Africa PLC AAF.L:

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - CHIMERA INVESTMENT LLC INVESTS $50M IN AIRTEL AFRICA’S MOBILE MONEY BUSINESS

  • AIRTEL AFRICA -PROCEEDS FROM TRANSACTION TO BE USED TO REDUCE GROUP DEBT AND INVEST IN NETWORK, SALES INFRASTRUCTURE IN RESPECTIVE OPERATING COUNTRIES

Source text for Eikon: [ID:]

Further company coverage: AAF.L
